de.masters_of_disaster.ant.tasks.calculatesize
クラス CalculateSize

java.lang.Object
  MatchingTask
      de.masters_of_disaster.ant.tasks.calculatesize.CalculateSize

public class CalculateSize
extends MatchingTask

Calculates the "Installed-Size" of a deb package for the "control"-file.
